data.weather: 4mm rain last Saturday. 20mm rain on Sunday / overnight into Monday. 2mm rain during Tuesday & 3.5mm overnight into Wednesday. 1mm rain during Wednesday morning, followed by a dry and sunny afternoon, with a stiff breeze. Dry & sunny on Thursday, with temps of 10C/11C. Dry overnight into Friday, with low of 2C. Dry and overcast day forecast for Friday with top temp of 9C. Rain moving in after racing.
data.other: Going Enquiries: Jonjo Sanderson - 07831 437453 Ian Ward - 07880 722586
data.rail: Due to the rainfall, we will operate shared bends at both ends of the course, these are set +9yds from the innermost point on the A1 bend & at the innermost point on the Chase course on the 'Away' bend. This means the hurdle course is now 24yds less than the standard innermost point. Official distances on the Chase races are affected as follows: Races 2,4 & 6: +54yds Hurdle/NHF races have 'temporary' official distances as follows: Races 1,5 & 7: 1m 7f & 175y. Race 3: 2m 5f 38y
